name: UniSVG
description: Image-to-SVG generation benchmark requiring structural vector graphics output from input images.

metrics.name: similarity_score
metrics.definition: Structural similarity between generated SVG and ground truth

test_method: Generate SVG markup from input images and evaluate using canonicalization plus similarity scoring.
notes: Report renderer (e.g., resvg) and whether post-processing (path simplification) was applied.
